node.doctext:
[rootbeer277's sandbox|clear parameters]

Display your writeup without links. This tool will eventually allow you to specify words to retain their links. Its purpose it to make it easier to post e2 writeups elsewhere on the internet. [{openform}] [% $query->textfield('searchname') %] Node name
[{closeform}] [% ########## ########## # Creates a clean, mostly unlinked version of one of your writeups # for posting elesewhere on the internet # TODO: You can specify words that will retain their hard / pipe links # For WYSIWYG editors, copy the formatted version on top # TODO: For HTML editors, copy the raw data version on the bottom # TODO: Includes radio button options to add a disclaimer: # "This article also/originally posted to Everything2.com" my $parent_e2nodeid; my $nodehash; my $linklessdoctext; my $csr; my $testexplain = 1; my $testexplainoutput = "

    "; unless ($query->param('searchname')) { return "

    Enter an e2node to search.

    "; } if (my $a = getNode($query->param('searchname'), 'e2node')) { $parent_e2nodeid = $a->{node_id}; } unless ($parent_e2nodeid) { return "

    Not a valid e2node.

    "; } if ($testexplain==0) { # find a writeup by the current user in the specified e2node $csr = $DB->sqlSelectMany ( "*", "node JOIN writeup ON node.node_id = writeup.writeup_id", "author_user = $USER->{node_id} AND writeup.parent_e2node = $parent_e2nodeid", "LIMIT 1" ); while (my $s = $csr->fetchrow_hashref) { $nodehash = getNodeById($s->{'node_id'}); } unless ($nodehash) { return "

    Writeup not found.

    "; } $linklessdoctext = $nodehash->{'doctext'}; $linklessdoctext =~ s/\[([^\]]+)\|([^\]]+)\]/$2/g; # remove pipelinks $linklessdoctext =~ s/\[([^\]]+)\]/$1/g; # remove hardlinks return $linklessdoctext . "\n\n

    This article originally posted on {'node_id'}>everything2.com

    "; } else { # EXPLAIN test # Note: look at "key" and "rows" # bad: key = NULL or "rows" = really big number or "use tmp tables" # Tips: nate says add "indexes" to fix that? How? my $dbh = $DB->getDatabaseHandle(); $csr = $dbh->prepare ("EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM node JOIN writeup ON node.node_id = writeup.writeup_id WHERE author_user = $USER->{node_id} AND writeup.parent_e2node = $parent_e2nodeid LIMIT 1"); $csr->execute(); while (my $s = $csr->fetchrow_hashref) { foreach my $keys (sort(keys(%{$s}))) { $testexplainoutput .= "\n\t
  1. " . $keys . ": " . $s->{$keys} . "
    2. "; } } return $testexplainoutput . "
"; } %]
